org.kitteh.irc.client.library

Interface Client.Builder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing interface:
    Client

    public static interface Client.Builder
extends Cloneable
    Builds Clients. Create a builder with Client.builder().

    The default built client connects securely via port 6697. See secure(boolean) to disable, or the other secure-prefixed methods in this builder to fully utilize the feature. Note that the default TrustManagerFactory relies on your local trust store. The default Oracle trust store does not support many commonly used certificate authorities (including StartCom) and does not accept self-signed.

      Client.Builder afterBuildConsumer(Consumer<Client> consumer)
      Sets up a Consumer to fire on the newly created client after it is built, prior to connection.
      Client.Builder afterBuildConsumerRemove()
      Removes the Consumer set to fire after the client is built.
      Client.Builder bindHost(String host)
      Binds the client to a host or IP locally.
      Client.Builder bindHostRemove()
      Binds the client to no specific host.
      Client.Builder bindPort(int port)
      Binds the client to the specified port.
      Client build()
      Clientmaker, clientmaker, make me a client, build me the client and begin connection, block me until afterBuildConsumer(Consumer) is run!

      Sets a listener for all thrown exceptions on this client.

      • bindHost

        @Nonnull
Client.Builder bindHost(@Nonnull
                                  String host)
        Binds the client to a host or IP locally.

        By default, the host is not set which results in wildcard binding.

        Parameters:
        host - host to bind to
        Returns:
        this builder

      • bindPort

        @Nonnull
Client.Builder bindPort(int port)
        Binds the client to the specified port. Invalid ports are set to 0.

        By default, the port is 0.

        Parameters:
        port - port to bind to
        Returns:
        this builder

      • listenException

        @Nonnull
Client.Builder listenException(@Nonnull
                                         Consumer<Exception> listener)
        Sets a listener for all thrown exceptions on this client. By default, a consumer exists which calls Throwable#printStackTrace() on all received exceptions.

        All exceptions are passed from a single, separate thread.

        Parameters:
        listener - catcher of throwable objects
        Returns:
        this builder

      • secure

        @Nonnull
Client.Builder secure(boolean ssl)
        Sets whether the client connects via SSL.

        Note that by default the TrustManager used does not accept the certificates of many popular networks. You must use secureTrustManagerFactory(TrustManagerFactory) to set your own TrustManagerFactory.

        Parameters:
        ssl - true for ssl
        Returns:
        this builder

      • webirc

        @Nonnull
Client.Builder webirc(@Nonnull
                                String password,
                                @Nonnull
                                String user,
                                @Nonnull
                                String host,
                                @Nonnull
                                InetAddress ip)
        Sets all the information for, and enables, WebIRC.

        By default, WebIRC is disabled.

        Parameters:
        password - password as defined in the IRCd config
        user - username part of the client's address
        host - hostname part of the client's address
        ip - client's IP address
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - for any null parameters
        See Also:
        webircRemove()
